Performance enhancements for analytical queries A central tenet of the lakehouse philosophy is delivering data warehouse-like performance on top of flexible, open storage. This balance demands more than just fast hardware: it requires a deep integration between query engines, metadata systems, and the underlying file formats to deliver sub-second or interactive query speeds over massive, ever-growing datasets.
